requirements.summary: Provide an in-app control that downloads the current ui-texts plain-text translations file exactly as used by the app.
acceptanceCriteria: A user can click a control in the UI and their browser downloads a `.txt` file containing the UI translations in the existing plain-text format.
The downloaded file contents match the app’s current translation source (including comments and section headers) and are not missing any keys.
The download works in a production build (not only in local dev).

file_operations.description: Centralize the UI translations plain-text source by importing `frontend/src/texts/ui-texts.txt?raw` and exporting (a) the raw plain-text content and (b) the expected downloaded filename (e.g., `ui-texts.txt`) so both translation loading and download use the exact same string in production builds.

Update translation loading to consume the raw plain-text string from `frontend/src/texts/uiTextsSource.ts` (instead of importing the txt directly) so the app’s translation source and the downloaded file always match exactly.

Implement a small utility that triggers a browser download by creating a `text/plain;charset=utf-8` Blob from the exported raw plain-text content, creating a temporary object URL, and clicking an `<a download>` link; ensure it uses the exported expected filename from `frontend/src/texts/uiTextsSource.ts`.

Add a user-accessible control (e.g., a link-styled button in the footer Quick Links or bottom bar) labeled to indicate downloading the translations file; wire its click handler to the `downloadUiTexts` utility so users can download the `.txt` file from the public UI. Use shadcn-ui (e.g., Button) only via existing imports if desired; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Document how to download the translations text file from the UI and how it maps to the repository source file.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/UI_TEXT_PLAIN_TEXT_WORKFLOW.md` documents the exact UI location/steps to download the `.txt` file.
Documentation names the repository source file (`frontend/src/texts/ui-texts.txt`) and the downloaded filename users should expect.

file_operations.description: Expand the workflow doc to (1) name the repository source file `frontend/src/texts/ui-texts.txt`, (2) describe the exact UI location/steps to download it (matching where the Footer control is added), and (3) state the exact downloaded filename users should expect (matching the filename used by the download utility).
